articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Vivek Ramaswamy calls his differences with Donald Trump 'very small' - India Today
articles.description: Vivek Ramaswamy, the Republican contender for the 2024 US Presidential elections, said there were "small differences" between him and Donald Trump but both of them are focused on being ‘America-first’.
articles.content: Indian-American Vivek Ramaswamy has acknowledged that there were some "very small" differences between him and former US president Donald Trump but they were "deeply aligned" on policy issues, 90-plu… [+2007 chars]
